mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Darias W. Weddle, Until he turned 21 years of age on 05.08.1895
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Darias W. Weddle, Until he turned 21 years of age on 05.08.1895 Fannie E. Weddle until she turned 21 years of age on 02.06.1897 Dollie A., John F., Alonzo E., Clyde M., Olin M., and Gracie D. Weddle Letitia C. Weddle, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4, page 474-475, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
